alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:00AM EDT until June 16 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Gilchrist County in northern Florida... * Until 645 AM EDT. * At 559 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Cross City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Possible tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trenton and Bell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
